replies.body:
I made this thing

[](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3UvZXL3FjX4)
I will buy Gnarwal skin hear our voices Riot.
I would really love a Gamer Gnar skin. When he's small he throws a controller. When he "rages" he throws a computer, or a desk with a computer on it. I would buy that.
I would prefer a poro Gnar, just for the cute-gasm but thats just me.
what about surfer Gnar? .... um um um  call it Gnarly
oh! i see what you did there.
i dont{{champion:64}}
that joke is so old its not even funny anymore :/
urf {{champion:150}} confirmed

These are all so cool! I'm constantly impressed by the artists in the League Community. If the Summoner's Showcase is interested in music, I made a Gnar song with Helynt that I feel demonstrates his transformation pretty well. I hope you can find a place for it! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=inPLCjJ7UwQ
Awesome video! I'm still dancing in my chair. :D
Thank you, I'm glad to hear you like it! Making people dance is one of the top five best things to do, so I guess we'll keep making music!
The fact that this song's transition is so sudden and like without warning fits Gnar perfectly. {{champion:150}}  I love Helynt
I LOVE THIS! What part did you do, Disciple?
Hi Heather! I did the vocals and made the video! Helynt produced the sick track!
Dude Nice that is a great song! Keep up the {{champion:150}} ly work!!
Rito, you forgot one!

Girlfriend doodled this while bored at work.

https://twitter.com/Mayhem_Maddie/status/500005955032322049/photo/1

Edit: By popular demand!

https://twitter.com/Ryokuji/status/500770689930891264
A doodle for one person is unimaginable hours spent and getting no where near the same result for me... Impressive doodling skills.
i just checked, you got this from google images.
If you'd like I can take a picture of me holding it since she gave me it as a gift lol. Her twitter where she uploaded it is even linked to the image xp

you rly should tho, even if just to show you cant trust what others say. ..... ie i just checked, you got this from google images. like yeah and how do we know he isnt just trolling and saying he checked. and btw once you post any picture on the net it almost always goes into google images because google images are the images from all over the web, that being known, its more like he could have posted it here then you searched google and it showed you his pic because it is now on the net.
:3 Rengar like this {{champion:107}}
There are no words to convey the level of cute in this post. :3

Definitely a higher level of cute Gnar then that of MEGA Gnar.

But seriously though he's so damn cute
Gentleman Gnar confirmed
we need this. Rito plz
why is it always women who do the cosplay, even the men of lol?
Men do cosplay, which do you think think gets more popular? The one with or without boobs?

> Men do cosplay, which do you think think gets more popular? The one with or without boobs?

so true

I didn't make this, but what about 2P's video?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yMVfwUuF0yU
It has begun!

*points* 
tHERE I AM :D

and dang these are all so cute omg new fave champion sorry ahri

I love your comic! It made me go awwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwww. :D

I don't know if you know, but we've featured your art before! You're super talented! http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/community-spotlight/super-galaxy-rumble-community-creations-roundup
i want a Panda Gnar skin for Lunar Revel 2015{{champion:150}}
woah woah woah... we still need a panda skin for the one bear in league, volibear! teemo gets one, annie too but why not voli !?!
One second he's kawaii, the next he's Japanese monster movie. And I still love him <3 {{champion:150}}
Kawaii into Kaiju
I need the dapper Gnar in my life.  Riot, please.
The one by N1PS should be a skin. Gentleman Gnar! 10/10 would buy.

what about a pool party gnar where little gnar throws a frisbee and big gnar throws a beach ball. make him where some blue trunks and goggles on his head instead of the skull on his head and i would buy.
for the love of god make a gnarwhal skin
Gnar is sooo overpowered! I can't bring myself to harm something so cute in lane! I can't handle the cute!
And then you regret it the most when he turns into mega gnar
how do you upload your own?
If you have more Gnar creations, please attach it to a comment in this thread so we can see! =)
4th down, left side.  Needs plushie.
*requires plushie
